definition[0]: a metallic noise sounds like pieces of metal hitting each other
example[0]: The key turned in the lock with a loud metallic click.
example[1]: The pans made a metallic clatter as they crashed to the floor.
definition[1]: a metallic voice is rough, hard, and unpleasant
example[2]: He spoke in a thin, metallic voice.
definition[2]: a metallic colour shines like metal
example[3]: He drives a metallic red van.
definition[3]: a metallic taste is bitter and unpleasant, like metal
example[4]: The gum left a horrible metallic taste in my mouth.
definition[4]: made of metal or containing metal
